title: Gross Domestic Expenditure on Research and Development time series dataset
summary: The most reliable estimates of national research and development spending that draws together information on research and development spending in the public and private sectors: business enterprises, government, higher education, private non-profit. It also shows which sectors are providing funding to research and development spending in the UK, and the data is also shown by civil and defense expenditure.
